message: We've made it, somehow.
As soon as we hobble in through the door, I gently set Clear down against the wall.
I take off his tattered coat. I'd like to carry him upstairs and lay him down in bed, but I don't think I could manage it.
Clear groans, his breathing unsteady.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Does it hurt?"

name: クリア
message: "...I'm fine."
It pains me to see him smile as he struggles for breath.
What am I supposed to do now?
I mean, I've fiddled with Allmates before, but I'm not crazy enough to try to fix a machine as complex as Clear.
...But I can't just do nothing.
For the time being, I decide to look for some tools to work with―but just as I get up, Clear grabs my jacket.

name: クリア
message: "Wait. ...Please don't leave me."
I freeze. He looks so pitiful, begging like that.

name: クリア
message: "Please, stay with me."
Unable to bear it, I crouch down beside him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I have to do something..."

name: クリア
message: "It's fine. It's... already too late."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?! What are you saying?!"

name: クリア
message: "I think I know my body best. When I destroyed the hard lock, I irreparably damaged the circuit that supplies power to my brainstem."

name: クリア
message: "So I'm already..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I can't believe you... You always take things too far...!"

name: クリア
message: "But I couldn't have saved you any other way. I don't believe I was wrong."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh. But how can I save you?"

name: クリア
message: "There's actually something I want more than that... Would you do me a favor?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "After I help you!"

name: クリア
message: "It's extremely unlikely that I can be saved. I'd prefer you grant my last wish than waste what time I have left."

name: クリア
message: "You weren't supposed to know about my wish. I never actually planned on telling you."

name: クリア
message: "It must be because I'm malfunctioning."

name: クリア
message: "I could never have wanted this if I hadn't been freed from my programming. Will you listen to my first and last request?"
I suddenly feel like crying... but I choke back the tears.
Still, my eyes and throat burn. No matter how hard I try, I can't keep my lips from trembling.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's no fair, putting it like that..."

name: クリア
message: "I'm sorry. Please? Will you grant my wish?"
Clear smiles apologetically and touches my cheek with his hand. Its mechanical workings are partly exposed.
I know that if I open my mouth, I won't be able to hold back the sobs. So I nod instead; Clear sighs with relief.

name: クリア
message: "Thank you. Well, here it goes."

name: クリア
message: "Please let me touch you, Aoba."
Clear's fingers gently caress my cheek.

name: クリア
message: "Ultimately, we're just machines. There's no way for us to become human."

name: クリア
message: "But even if it's just for a moment, I want to touch you like another human being. I want to show you how I feel about you."

name: クリア
message: "If you could grant that request..."
I find myself mesmerized by the sincerity in Clear's eyes.
I have a pretty good guess what he means by wanting to "touch" me.
And right now... I want to do whatever he asks.
Plus, I want to touch him too.
He went through so much to keep me safe.
I want to... offer him some comfort.
If it will make him happy... I'll do anything for him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sure."
